sentences.sContent: We’re getting a lot of enquiries about our new London-Rio service.
sentences.sCn: 许多人来打听我们新开设的伦敦－里约热内卢的航班情况。

sentences.sContent: They followed this line of enquiry because another property of self-organised criticality is that each event, on average, triggers only one other.
sentences.sCn: 他们选用这种方式进行探究是因为自我组织临界的另一个特性是：平均来说，每一次触发都是一个接一个的。

sentences.sContent: Although the key result turned out negative, the researchers concluded that there is reason to pursue this line of enquiry further.
sentences.sCn: 虽然，关键的结果是消极的，研究人员得出结论，认为他们有理由要作进一步的追求，继续探索的路线。

trans.tranOther: a question you ask in order to get information
